resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108083</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108083</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204413</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The problem with parallax</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Problem mit Parallaxe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le problème avec la parallaxe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O problema com parallax</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il problema con parallasse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το πρόβλημα με parallax</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El problema con paralaje</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will increase their understanding of astronomical measurements by using parallax to measure distances on their school campus. They will also gain an appreciation of the difficulties with such measurements by statistically analyzing the class' results.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer erhöhen ihr Verständnis der 
astronomischen Messen, indem sie Parallaxe verwenden, um Abstände auf
ihrem Schulecampus zu messen. Sie gewinnen auch eine Anerkennung
der Schwierigkeiten mit solchen Messen, indem sie statistisch die 
Resultate der Kategorien analysieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants augmenteront leur arrangement des 
mesures astronomiques en employant la parallaxe pour mesurer des 
distances sur leur campus d'école. Ils gagneront également une
appréciation des difficultés avec de telles mesures en analysant 
statistiquement les résultats des classes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes aumentarão sua compreensão de 
medidas astronômicas usando o parallax medir distâncias em seu 
campus da escola. Ganharão também uma apreciação das 
dificuldades com tais medidas estatìstica analisando os resultados 
das classes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi aumenteranno la loro comprensione 
delle misure astronomiche usando il parallasse per misurare le 
distanze sulla loro città universitaria della scuola. 
Egualmente guadagneranno un apprezzamento delle difficoltà con 
tali misure statisticamente analizzando i risultati dei codici 
categoria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα αυξήσουν την κατανόηση αστρονομικών 
μετρήσεών τους με τη χρησιμοποίηση parallax στις αποστάσεις 
μέτρου στη σχολική πανεπιστημιούπολή τους. Θα κερδίσουν 
επίσης μια εκτίμηση των δυσκολιών με τέτοιες μετρήσεις με τη 
στατιστικά ανάλυση των αποτελεσμάτων των κλάσεων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes aumentarán su comprensión de 
medidas astronómicas usando paralaje para medir distancias en su 
campus de la escuela. También ganarán un aprecio de las 
dificultades con tales medidas estadístico analizando los resultados 
de las clases.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:GEOL 130
FN:GEOL 130
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108083</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
